title: Martijn Rats: Do Equities Markets Believe the Price of Oil?
description: Are current oil prices sustainable? Although oil prices have rallied sharply over the last year, the performance of oil equities has been modest by comparison.
itunes:title: Martijn Rats: Do Equities Markets Believe the Price of Oil?
itunes:summary: Are current oil prices sustainable? Although oil prices have rallied sharply over the last year, the performance of oil equities has been modest by comparison.
